Welcome to my website!

I am a postdoctoral fellow in Business Economics at the Alberta School of Business, University of Alberta. I received my Ph.D. from the Kelley School of Business, Indiana University. 

I work on topics in health economics, household finance, and industrial organization. 

Email: <span style="color:navy">yanhao.wang [at] ualberta.ca</span>
